comment: Professor Liebman's class was easy as long as you read the text and make an effort to understand the quizes (which was more like homework). Do the extra credit because it is an easy A! This was a very organized class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Liebman is an excellent professor, and I thoroughly enjoyed this class. His weekly videos, in-depth reviews before exams, outstanding group participation assignments, and supportive nature showed that he cares about his students and their performance. Professor Liebman's teaching style and methodology made learning online very engaging!
Great Professor!!! Highly recommended lots of opportunities to get a decent grade and he also offers extra credit. Final and midterm are on lock down browser.

Awesome Professor!!! Honestly if you watch the video reviews that he post before the exams and study the power points along with any examples he mentions you'll do well. The discussion post were easy just read the article and answer questions. Quizzes are difficult but u have 3 attempts. He also has extra credit I highly recommend doing those.

Great Professor. Lots of quizzes but you have 3 attempts. The 10 disccusions boards are easy if you read and understand the articles. The midterm and final are tough but if you study his video reviews before the final and midterm you should do okay. Also the final and midterm are with Lockdown browser.

Professor Liebman is a really nice man. Overall his class was okay. There were at least 2 quizzes each week on aplia. There were 3 attempts for each section of the quiz so that was pretty helpful. Total of 10 discussion which were okay. Midterm and final were difficult for me. He also gives 2 extra credit opportunities.

I really like Professor Liebman, he's a really nice guy and really understanding and helpful. The quizzes get harder as the class progresses so get easy As on the first couple. Discussions are easy and Exams are hard.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: This class involves a lot of long lectures, but they are very clear and informative.  The quizzes are fairly easy and are based off the lectures.  Midterm and final are honestly really easy if you study.  I definitely recommend taking him online!

Amazing teacher! I hate math and econ but he makes it so clear. However, there is a ton of work to do. If you watch the lectures, read the book, do discussions, 2 extra credit and aplia hw you will be fine!

Professor Liebman is a very nice guy. You will have a lot of work. Weekly articlediscussion questions. First input by Fri and Second input by Sunday. Weekly online quizzes. Usually 2 chapters each week. You get three chances per question. MidtermFinal on campus which sucks when you live in Gwinnett County. 2 extra credit opportunities.

Professor Liebman is a kind and considerant. You have weekly quizzes online. The midtem and final are taken on campus. He also offers extra credit opportunities. He really wants his students to succeed. I would highly reccomend taking Professor Liebman's class.

I took this class online and found it fairly easy to understand.  There are weekly quizzes with two attempts and in-person mid term and final.  Professor Liebman is considerate and fair.  His tests are close to the reviews he provides before each test. There are also weekly articles related to economics that you "discuss." Great professor!

Online Course- Easy A if you do your work and study for exams. Two exams, weekly discussions, and weekly quizzes. I took this course in a face-to-face setting and made a C.....took it online and made an A. He is very to the point, very easy to understand, and quick to respond to the needs of the students. GREAT PROFESSOR!!

Online- You do not need your book for this teacher. He has great power points and all test and quizes come from such. You do need to attend the online classes to get a good grade in this course. However, class attendance not required, but saved for later review. 1 quiz with 2 attempts & 1 discussion weekly. Then final & midterm worth 50 % of grade.

I took his class online. It was a lot of work, but it is not hard if you put the effort into it. He is extremely helpful, and he offered an online lecture to teach the material. Quizzes were 2 attemps each. Look at the material one to two weeks prior to the tests. Liebman was a great prof. overall. Highly reccommend :)
Took this course online, tests were in person.  Lots of chances to get a good grade.  Hard, but he made it very clear.  Would take him again.

I had to give him a B. He is very involved in the work and definetly knows his stuff. Took him online, quizzes on lines mid terms and final on campus. Open book for quizzes with 2 attempts for 2 hours. but final not open book. I still managed a C with a 51 on the Final, so he is more than fair. I just wasnt interested in the content.

I loved the Prof hated the material, I did not do any studying because of lack of interest and I will be getting a c or b. This is with failing the midterm and final with grades under 50. Just do the extra credit, all of the quizzes, and the discussion questions.

Took this class online. This professor is great! The material is very clear. There are biweekly classes given online but you don't actually have to attend. But you do have to  watch the archived classes or read the book. Each week there is a quiz on the chapter and a discussion to post to. The tests are hard so you do have to study.

Took this class online and it was very challenging. The professor is very helpful though. Make sure you take advantage of extra credit, you will need it!!! The lectures are archived in case you miss live online lecture, this is really helpful to review whenever you want.

I took this class online. He is very helpful and gives extra credit. There are many opportunities to bring your grade up. He holds an online class through Wimba, but you don't have to attend. Mid term and final are face to face Overall, a great teacher!
Really hard teacher. Kinda funny but in a corny way. Puts you to sleep, so read book. Everything from test is directly from book and study guide. :)

What are people talking about? this class is easy. I barely showed up. He usually puts his powerpoints online so you can just study them instead of going to class. theres 10 points of total extra credit, =. Drops the lowest test, what more can you ask for. Sure hes boring, but hes a nice guy. It's an easy A if your intelligence is above a brick.

The class was easy, but he is pretty boring. C'mone guys who said economics is fun and interesting. He gives you extra credit and drops the lowest test.The extra credit can bring your grade a WHOLE LETTER UP. Showing up to class is not mandatory but it's really helpful. His class was Ok. So just go for it.

all powerpoints. he tries to be funny and relate to the students with examples like sex and beer. its kinda cute. really nice man. gives 10 points of extra credit to final grade. definitely recommend doing the EC. tests are hard. online econlabs for hw are easy. only need and 80 on hw to get full credit. must go to class in order to go decent.
Worst teacher ever.  Boring does not explain it.  There was a previous review that someone said he was okay. NO! I would rather drop out than take him again.

he is very boring. the test are tricky, you have to come to class in order to pass. I hate econ, and he didn't help at all. I bought the study guide and that didn't help.  If you can, find another teacher!

I really wanted to take this class, but it was horrible. You really need to teach yourself. The book has an website that really helps. No busy work here. Just 3 tests and Final, and 3 readings for extra credit which are 3.3 pts a piece-- towards test's grades. You will need the book and buy the study guide, too. Lot's of time on this one.

He never takes attendance, so pretty much no one comes to class unless it's test day.  He drops your lowest test score, and gives you a few easy extra credit opportunities.  While the class is  easy, he is very dry and completely uninteresting, so it makes coming to class harder and the material even more boring.

Very Easy teacher, I don't see what everybodies problem is.  I got an easy A.  Best of all there was no paper to write.  He even droped the lowest test.  Power points are online and review sessions really tell you stuff you should focus on, but not quite all of it.
No Comments

This teacher has a background in business.  His main area of expertise is not teaching.  In my opinion, the tests didn't reflect the material from class.  I think quite a few people in the class (including myself) dropped it.  I just felt lost.
Not very understandable and doesn't explain the material correctly. You basicly have to figure it out on your own.
